attributes.action: recognise the trouble facing hichingbrooke hospital and to intervene
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hichingbrooke hospital is a credit to the nhs staff,nurses and doctors are second to none fast efficient friendly 
services such as a&e are facing closure
with the east of england forecast expected to grow massively over the next 25 years closing any hospital in the area no matter if they are in debt is ludicrous and criminal
